title: Taric and Yorick need rework!
body: I've played a few games with these champions, and I find it so easy to counter there moves and out play them. This makes it boring for players against them, and the player using the champ. Rito needs to rework these champs so they require skill and can makes awesome plays. Im sure they can put a new look on these champs!

replies.body: They're both scheduled for reworks. If I remember right, Taric's next on the list.

Pretty sure Warwick's getting one in the future.
still need to finish shen, then yes its taric, then after taric, our long yorick wait (supposedly) will be over
i like taric. Ya'll dont like taric?! TRULY OUTRAGEOUS

I just find that, there is no real proper play with these champs and I wanted to put out there they need this rework to be well looked over, and not make them "Over Powered" with high scaling or ridiculous ability's.

its not about the ability of outplay and "countering" its just that their kits are so outdated, basic, stale, has no synergy. after the shen changes taric and yorick should be the next ones for a rework
Taric is getting a rework after shen which means he is next for the rework. I am not sure about yorick though.
